name: Unity5 Character Selection
description: Inside the zip is the corresponding unity package which included is an example built character selection screen mostly used for ARPG,CRPG,TBRPG games but it an be used for anything you wish to have a selection, Also i used cubes as placeholder objects to show that all you need o do is replace the model. The code is free to be used for any project you wish provided you purchased this package. Also there is only one screenshot of the screen because i can't really show much else except the code and if i showed that then obviously there would be no point in selling this.
